explains: adj. 值得羡慕的，引起忌妒的

sentences.en: She is a woman of enviable beauty.
sentences.cn: 她这个女人美丽得让人羡慕。

sentences.en: He is in the enviable position of having two job offers to choose from.
sentences.cn: 他有两份工作可选，真让人羡慕。

sentences.en: About a decade ago, university students could find satisfactory and enviable jobs after their graduation.
sentences.cn: 大约十年前，大学生毕业后可以找到令人满意和羡慕的工作。
